name: DUMP&SPLIT
description:
HEADPHONE WARNING: THIS GAME WAS MADE TO BE NOT THE BEST SO BEWARE OF LOUD NOISES THAT WILL KILL YOUR EAR DRUMS :)

this is a game me and a friend made for funz for the midjam2022 on newgrounds hosted by ninjamuffin99.

pick up chickz, listen to the pitch of there voice to tell if its a boy or not and use them for your empire to destroy cars !!!!!!!!!!!

after a treacherous night......... here it is 

Select - A Move - Arrows Back - Esc Thanks Vib-Ribbon for being so dang cute and catchy !!!!
